results.title: Merge and extract PDF files
results.description: Learn how to combine multiple PDF files or split PDF files in SharePoint.

descriptions.content: The Extract option lets you divide a PDF file into multiple PDF files.
Merge PDF files To merge PDF files, follow these steps: In a SharePoint document library or OneDrive, open one of the PDF files you want to combine.

results.title: PDF actions reference - Power Automate
results.description: Explore Power Automate's PDF actions to extract data, manage files, and streamline document processing with ease.

descriptions.content: Explore Power Automate's PDF actions to extract data, manage files, and streamline document processing with ease.

results.title: PDF reader in Microsoft Edge
results.description: Learn about PDF reader in Microsoft Edge.

descriptions.content: PDF reader in Microsoft Edge PDF files make up a large part of our day-to-day lives.
This PDF reader gives users a single application to meet web page and PDF document needs.
